name: Divine Philodendron
description: They are native to the tropical rainforests of Central and South America. Philodendrons are popular houseplants because they are easy to care for and have a variety of foliage.

name: The fiddle-leaf fig
description: A flowering plant native to western Africa. It's a popular houseplant known for its large, violin-shaped leaves.

name: Paradise plant
description: The paradise plant, known for its close resemblance to a palm tree, It's perfect for a modern and sophisticated office.

name: Combinaison
description: A blend of our best plants, perfect for adding a natural touch to your life.

name: Cuddly Cactus
description: The Cuddly Cactus gets its name due to the absence of spine clusters, making it a safe option to keep around pets and children.

name: Spider Plant Variegated
description: The Spider Plant's easy-going nature and green and white striped foliage make it one of the most popular houseplants around.

name: Peperomia Green Gold
description: The Peperomia Green Gold has thick fleshy leaves with striking green and gold variegation.

name: ZZ Plant
description: The ZZ Plant is characterized by its waxy green leaves above the surface of its potting mix, and its large potato-like rhizomes underneath.

name: Fairy Castle Cactus
description: The Fairy Castle Cactus gets its charming name due to its stalks resembling the architecture of a castle.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: The Fiddle Leaf Fig (Ficus lyrata), is famous for its broad green leaves with prominent veining.

name: Large Majesty Palm
description: The Majesty Palm is a popular tropical palm known for its graceful, long green fronds.

name: Large Dracaena Compacta Cane
description: The Dracaena Compacta Cane is a tall and slender silhouette that is great in corners, and gets its name due to the growth habit being more compact than other varieties of Dracaena.
